title: Lowest External Debt Stocks (Private Nonguaranteed)
description: In 2022, Botswana had one of the lowest external debt stocks for private nonguaranteed loans, amounting to just $4,347,683.20.

title: Lowest PPG, IDA Debt
description: In 2023, Botswana had one of the lowest levels of PPG, IDA debt, with a total of only $45,000.

title: Highest Electricity Production from Coal
description: In 2022, 96.19% of Botswana's electricity was produced from coal sources, one of the highest percentages globally.
